text: 2.19 Nam 16.5, 16.26, Ais 52.11, Nah 1.7, Jon 10.14, 10.27, Lom 8.35, 1 Ko 8.3, 1 Jo 2.19 Pen binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok, God kɨlop mab meg tek ak puŋɨlek wos gɨl mɨdeb. Mab meg anɨb ak, takaw olap ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agup, Bɨawl ak binɨb ne okok kɨlop gos nɨgup agup. Pen takaw olap tɨkɨl agup, Binɨb mɨdupsek Bɨawl yɨl mɨdobun apal okok, tap si tap tɨmel adek okok kelɨgɨnɨgel agup.
